{!Job__c.Account_Name__c} ENSI Reinforcement Email #4
Greetings {!Contact.FirstName}
Two questions…
What is the meaning of: **WATNOTOS? How intentionally STYLE flexible are you?
Personal double check: What is your underlying reflex style – tending to be more ‘Red’ or more ‘Blue’? Remember under stress there is a strong likelihood you will drift to your reflex style.
Best wishes
{!Job__c.Facilitator_names__c} www.negotiate.org
** WATNOTOS – What Are The Needs Of The Other Side?
P +61 2 9299 9688 | E info.ens@negotiate.org Level 5 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia
